about_the_game:
The highly anticipated Lust Theory Season 3 is now available for WISHLIST!

You play as a young man, working his way through college. With a broken heart, you mostly avoid parties and lead a rather boring and uneventful life. One day, all of that changes with the arrival of a new neighbor, Samantha. You and your roommate, Hailey, quickly learn that Samantha isn't like the other girls. With a little help of your new friend, you get out of your cocoon and start living the proper college life.

Meet Hailey, your roommate. You've know her for so long, you practically see her as one of the boy's. But with your newly opened eyes, she soon starts being more than just a friend...

Samantha is the new hot neighbor that lives next door. Looks, brains, money? She's got it all. But not everything is as it seems on the surface.

Becky... Well, let's not talk too much about her.

....and a few more.

Game Content:
- 10.699 IMAGES
- 303 ANIMATIONS

Gameplay:
- Define the relationships within the game
- Slut angle
- Nude Mode
- Lust Time
- Change angle
- Multiple Endings

WARNING!
WARNING!
This game is for ADULTS only and it includes explicit, sexual content, drug abuse and controversial sexual content (incest) that some viewers may find offensive. The characters shown in the game are all over 18 years old.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04+ or Kernel 3.x+ based distributions
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 compatible
  • Storage: 7 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X Yosemite 10.10
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2, DirectX 9, OpenGL ES 2 or WebGL
  • Storage: 7 GB available space

name: LustyVerse: Passion on Display

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows XP or higher
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 7 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: As a young college student, you live a mostly mundane life of studying, working and hanging out. However, that all changes when a new girl moves in next door. With her arrival, you start to spend your free time very differently, resulting in many dramatic and interesting twists and turns.
